item.title: Dodie Clark & Thomas Sanders - Birds - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Birds by Dodie Clark & Thomas Sanders from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, C, D, D7, E7, Em, F♯7, F♯m, G, Gm.
